title: IIM Nagpur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Project Associate Post
description: Indian Institute of Management Nagpur (IIM Nagpur) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacncies for Project Associate Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the Post-Graduation can grab this chance and apply for the IIM Nagpur Recruitment 2025. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts.
